title: In first, US intel agencies warn climate change driving security threats
content:
1. In first, US intel agencies warn climate change driving security threats  The Times of Israel
  2. Climate change will bring global tension, US intelligence report says  BBC News
  3. Climate Change Poses a Widening Threat to National Security  The New York Times
  4. Biden admin. 'officially recognizing' link between climate change, migration  Fox News
  5. Reports warn climate change threatens national security  CBS Evening News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
